tool_description: Manages customer consent records for compliance with privacy regulations including GDPR, CCPA, and CAN-SPAM requirements.

consent_type.description: Type of consent: marketing, transactional, analytics, personalization

action.description: Action to perform: grant, revoke, check, update

consent_source.description: Source of consent: website, mobile_app, email, phone, in_store

explicit_consent.description: Whether this is explicit consent (required for some jurisdictions)

error_messages: Customer not found: The provided customer_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid consent type: consent_type must be one of: marketing, transactional, analytics, personalization.
Invalid action: action must be one of: grant, revoke, check, update.
Invalid consent source: consent_source must be one of: website, mobile_app, email, phone, in_store.
Consent record not found: No existing consent record found for this customer and consent type.
usage: Provide customer_id, consent_type, and action. For grant/update actions, specify consent_source and explicit_consent as needed.

consent_status.description: Current consent status: granted, revoked, expired, pending

consent_date.description: Date when consent was last updated (date-time format)

expiry_date.description: Date when consent expires if applicable (date-time format)
